hero.title: An Unforgettable Culinary Journey
hero.subtitle: Experience modern American cuisine crafted with passion and presented with artistry. Our seasonal menus showcase the finest local ingredients, complemented by an extensive wine collection and impeccable service.

about.title: Our Story
about.body: The Grand Table opened in 2015 with a vision: create an elevated dining experience that celebrates American cuisine through a modern lens. Our award-winning chef, James Chen, brings together classical techniques and innovative flavors, sourcing ingredients from local farms and artisan producers. Every dish tells a story, every meal is a celebration.
about.subtitle: What sets us apart

items.text: An exceptional dining experience from start to finish. The halibut was perfectly cooked and the wine pairing was spot-on. Can't wait to return!
items.author: Alexandra Reed

items.text: Celebrated our anniversary at The Grand Table and it was perfect. The chef's table experience is a must-try. Impeccable service and incredible food.
items.author: Michael & Sarah Thompson

items.text: The best fine dining experience in the city. Every course was beautifully presented and delicious. The sommelier's recommendations were excellent.
items.author: David Chen

members.name: James Chen
members.title: Executive Chef & Owner
members.bio: With over 20 years of culinary experience, Chef Chen has trained in Michelin-starred kitchens across the US and Europe. His modern American cuisine celebrates seasonal ingredients and refined techniques.

members.name: Sophie Laurent
members.title: Pastry Chef
members.bio: Trained at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris, Chef Laurent brings French pastry excellence to The Grand Table. Her seasonal desserts are works of art.

members.name: Marcus Williams
members.title: Head Sommelier
members.bio: With certifications from the Court of Master Sommeliers, Marcus curates our wine program and creates perfect pairings for every dish.

items.question: Do you require reservations?
items.answer: Reservations are strongly recommended. We accept walk-ins based on availability, but we often book up, especially on weekends.

items.question: What is your dress code?
items.answer: Business casual or above. We kindly ask that guests avoid athletic wear, shorts, and flip-flops.

items.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions?
items.answer: Absolutely. Please inform us of any allergies or dietary needs when booking. Our chef can create custom dishes for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other requirements.

items.question: Can I host a private event?
items.answer: Yes! We have three private dining spaces accommodating 2-40 guests. Contact us for availability and custom menu options.

items.question: What is the Chef's Table experience?
items.answer: Dine in our kitchen alongside the culinary team. This intimate 2-6 person experience includes a custom tasting menu and wine pairing. Advance reservations required.

items.question: Do you offer wine pairings?
items.answer: Yes! Our sommelier offers curated wine pairings with your meal. Choose from our 4-course pairing or discuss custom options.

items.question: Is valet parking available?
items.answer: Yes, complimentary valet parking is available Tuesday-Saturday evenings.

items.question: Can I purchase gift certificates?
items.answer: Yes! Gift certificates are available for purchase online or by calling us. They make perfect gifts for food lovers.
